Package allegroTaskClient

Class Operations

  • java.lang.Object
    • allegroTaskClient.Operations
  • public final class Operations
extends java.lang.Object
    Class containing all methods and variables related to performing operations on the RESTful web service. Based on user command line input, different actions, like listing movies or adding new ones, are performed.
    Author:
    Maciej Smolen
